displayName: Maze Ransomware Network Detection by Furkan Celik
description: The malware tries to make connections to IP addresses that have been crypted in the binary to send information about the infected machine. Author: Furkan Celik. Rule ID: bafb8a08-efb6-4828-b096-5b6f3b72fb87. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md. Reference: https://tdm.socprime.com/tdm/info/eRw8zWVyyEXk.
